properties.entry: SELECT ROWNUM, FILE_PATH,FILE_NM,MEMBER_NO,COUNT FROM ATTACHMENT LEFT JOIN BOARD USING (BOARD_NO) JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT,MEMBER_NO FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE_NO =1 AND MEMBER_NO =? AND BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY MEMBER_NO) USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE FILE_LEVEL = 0 AND MEMBER_NO = ? AND BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_TYPE_NO=1 AND ROWNUM < 5 ORDER BY FILE_NO DESC

SELECT ROWNUM, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_NO,COUNT FROM BOARD JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT,MEMBER_NO FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE_NO =2 AND MEMBER_NO =? AND BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY MEMBER_NO) USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_TYPE_NO=2 AND ROWNUM < 7 ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT ROWNUM, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_NO,COUNT FROM BOARD JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT,MEMBER_NO FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE_NO =3 AND MEMBER_NO =? AND BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY MEMBER_NO) USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_TYPE_NO=3 AND ROWNUM < 7 ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) BOARD_LIKE,MEMBER_NO FROM BOARD_LIKE WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? GROUP BY MEMBER_NO
SELECT COUNT(*) COMMENT_LIKE,MEMBER_NO FROM COMMENT_LIKE WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? GROUP BY MEMBER_NO
